name: Na Batida
description:
Na Batida is an online dance battle game in which you form your team and fight against others. This is the first open test build and was developed in 60 days. We count on your feedback.

Register: http://nabatida.hopto.org:6661/users/login

Chat for bugs, sugestions, feedbacks: https://discord.gg/cZavKe7

Controls: A S D F

Skills: Q and W

Modes: traning and battle
